|brand = Tenda |model = W522U |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = v1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = September 14, 2011 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Tenda_W522U |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = AN600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = USB |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = Male A |formfactor = dongle
|vendor_id = 148f |device_id = 3572 |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = V7TW522U |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = C8:3A:35
|chip1 = Ralink;RT3572; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 08/14/2012 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = 9SIAE9V5Z52842 |asin = B007TSRDZG |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== The file name of the Linux driver (included in the driver download :from the Tenda site) indicates that this device uses RT3572.
The adapter is shown as using two ''[[Skyworks]]'' (''SiGe'') [http://www.skyworksinc.com/Product.aspx?ProductID=956 SE2595L] :(Dual Band 802.11n WLAN Front End IC) in the FCC photos.
Assumed C8:3A:35 (''[[Tenda]]'') OUI (shown in the FCC external shot, :though barely.. it's also the only current ''Tenda'' OUI)
This [https://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=9SIAE9V5Z52842 product listing on newegg] makes the claim that this adapter is an alternative to the [[Samsung WIS12ABGNX]] for use with certain Samsung TVs. That's not too surprising since they use the same chipset and likely have the same USB IDs.
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:Side_1_close_view.jpg File:Side_2_close_view.jpg File:Side_1_general_view.jpg File:Side_2_general_view.jpg </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
